4300520.name: Second Monitor Gladiators
4300520.description:
Second Monitor Gladiators is a lightweight ludus management game built specifically to be played or watched alongside your main activity. Train your gladiators, send them into battles, earn gold, and steadily grow your ludus into a legendary arena powerhouse—all without demanding your full attention.

The game focuses on meaningful strategic decisions rather than heavy micromanagement. Assign gladiators to fights, manage upgrades, and observe battles unfold while you work, browse, stream, or play another game.

Play solo against AI-controlled opponents or enter multiplayer, where your gladiators face off against fighters trained by other players. Victories earn gold, reputation, and the resources needed to strengthen your roster.

Designed for short sessions or long-term progression, Second Monitor Gladiators fits perfectly on a second monitor, letting you manage your ludus at your own pace while staying focused on what matters most.

Features

Second-Monitor Friendly Gameplay

Play or watch battles while doing your main activities—no constant input required.

Ludus Management

Build and upgrade your ludus, manage your gladiator roster, and improve performance through smart investments.

Automated Battles

Send gladiators into combat and watch the results unfold, focusing on strategy rather than direct control.

Singleplayer Progression

Fight AI opponents, earn gold, and expand your ludus at your own pace.

Multiplayer Battles

Send your gladiators to battle fighters trained by other players and prove whose ludus reigns supreme.

Lightweight & Low Attention

Designed to run smoothly in the background, perfect for multitasking.

Strategic Growth

Decide how to spend your gold—stronger gladiators, better gear, or improved facilities.
